extendedInfo.description: Organize your closet, plan your outfits, get inspired by our stylists with daily updates, and rediscover the fun of shopping.  Looking Stylish is fun, easy and within budget with Stylicious. Its made for your phone and your tablet too!  Closet OrganizerSnap the pictures of your clothes, shoes, bags and accessories and store them in Stylicious. Use them to create looks or to plan what to wear.  LookbookMix, match, play, and create amazing outfits in seconds! Itâs your lookbook and fitting room â never buy anything without trying it first here.  Use clothes from your closet or from the shopping section.Style PlannerPlan what you are going to wear and when.  Never wear the same thing twice.  Shopping We have your favorite brands and the best new stylesâ¦ Have fun shopping, discover faboulus fashion finds, create a look with them, share them or buy them.  Check first in your closet and make sure you don't have a similar items already.Style InspirationAwesome looks and style tips created by stylists to help you make the right style decisions!  Get weekly fashion inspirations by our stylist Monica Giliati from Les EffrontÃ©s.Much More Fashion and StyleTravel planner, Fashion Notes, Shopping Bookmarks, Sharing on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest  and Tumblr, and much much more tools to improve your Style while organizing your closet!

reviews.title: Love it! !
reviews.comment: Used a few of these virtual closet apps,  this one is the best by far.  Comes in handy since I have a tiny closet and never know what I have.  This is also the best way to keep all your clothes in rotation.  One suggestion would be to add the option to take multiple pictures of each piece of clothing since some have front and back detail that you would like to show.  Excellent app!
reviews.author: Kathy Rua

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like the app but i want to be able to layer the clothes but theres a stupid white bar at the bottom... and there r too many clothes on models i like the ones off of models... and when i make a look and delete a clothing from my look its still there.... other than that i love it but could u consider some changes i mentioned!?!
reviews.author: Silvia Caddell

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Been looking for a app like this c:
reviews.author: Lizbeth Rodriguez

reviews.title: Please fix/add
reviews.comment: Fix: When I look at my calendar, it has 2 of all my clothes.  Add?: I wish you could have a separate row for camis and jackets so its easier
reviews.author: Meghan S.

reviews.title: Awesome, but hard to use.
reviews.comment: I took pictures of everything in my closet, but now it is a hassle uploading them one by one. I have tons of camisols, why can\'t I upload them all at once under the same categories? (Summer, casual, tank top) that would help. And I think there should be a random button, where it shuffles to a random top, pants, and accessory for those days I really don\'t know what to were. Great app!
reviews.author: Kelly Roberts

reviews.title: Keeps closing
reviews.comment: This app is good but it keeps closing on me.
